analysis.description:
EtherKnightGame.process_sub_Taxes (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#653-693) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_dev)(owner,address(0)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#676-677)
	- HDXcontract.appreciateTokenPrice.value(_appreciation)() (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#689-690)

Reentrancy in EtherKnightGame.CoreBuyShare (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#758-850):
	External calls:
	- _nb_token = HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_tempo)(_player_address,_referrer_address) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#786-790)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#802-804)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#804-806)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#809)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#819-823)
	- PlayerGameRound (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#793-795)
	- PlayerGameRound (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#811)
	- PlayerGameRound (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#824-832)

Reentrancy in EtherKnightGame.CoreBuyShare (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#758-850):
	External calls:
	- _nb_token = HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_tempo)(_player_address,_referrer_address) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#786-790)
	- process_sub_Taxes(_GameRoundData,200000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#834-836)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#839-840)
	- GameRoundData (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#843-844)

EtherKnightGame.ApplyAction (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#1036-1178) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gamevar.turnround == 1

EtherKnightGame.ApplyAction (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#1036-1178) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gamevar.turnround == 1
EtherKnightGame.actionTreasure (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#989-1006) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gamevar.event_target == perso
gamevar in EtherKnightGame.ApplyAction (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#1052-1054) is a local variable never initialiazed

EtherKnightGame.process_sub_Taxes (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#653-693) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-HDXcontract.buyTokenFromGame.value(_dev)(owner,address(0)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#676-677)
Parameter '_referrer_address' of HDX20Interface.buyTokenFromGame (/unique_chucks/7/0xd9ff8cc0433c995f3a9711f1400329cd6a40387f.sol#49-51) is not in mixedCase
